briefTitle: Azelaic Acid on Demodex Counts in Rosacea
officialTitle: The Effect of Azelaic Acid (Financea Gel 15%) on Demodex Folliculorum Counts in Adult Subjects With Mild to Moderate Papulopustular Rosacea
summary: The purpose of this study is to measure the effects of azelaic acid on Demodex folliculorum counts and disease condition via a split face design in approximately twenty patients with mild to moderate rosacea. The investigators hypothesize that treatment of rosacea with azelaic acid will lead to a decreased Demodex folliculorum count as well as an improvement in lesion count and redness.
